test-case.name: subtyping-020
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('xs:integer', '(xs:string | xs:decimal)')

test-case.name: subtyping-021
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('xs:int+', '(xs:string | xs:long)*')

test-case.name: subtyping-022
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('(xs:date | xs:time)', '(xs:time | xs:dateTime | xs:date)+')

test-case.name: subtyping-023
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('(xs:hexBinary | xs:base64Binary)', '(xs:base64Binary | xs:hexBinary)')

test-case.name: subtyping-024
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('(xs:hexBinary | xs:base64Binary | xs:string)', '(xs:base64Binary | xs:hexBinary)')

test-case.name: subtyping-025
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('(xs:long | xs:int)', 'xs:integer')

test-case.name: subtyping-026
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('record(a, b)', '(map(*) | array(*))')

test-case.name: subtyping-066
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a|b, xs:long)', '(element(a, xs:integer)|element(b, xs:decimal))')

test-case.name: subtyping-067
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('(element(a, xs:integer)|element(b, xs:integer))', 'element(a|b, xs:decimal)')

test-case.name: subtyping-070
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a, xs:integer)', 'element(a, xs:decimal)')

test-case.name: subtyping-071
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a, xs:integer)', 'element(a, xs:long)')

test-case.name: subtyping-072
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a, xs:numeric)', 'element(a, xs:long)')

test-case.name: subtyping-073
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a, xs:long)', 'element(a, xs:numeric)')

test-case.name: subtyping-074

modified.change: syntax of second type was invalid

test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(p1:*, xs:long)', 'element(*, xs:numeric)')

test-case.name: subtyping-075
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('element(a|b|c, xs:boolean)', '(element(a)|element(b)|element(c))')

test-case.name: subtyping-103
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('record(a,b as xs:integer)', 'record(a,b as xs:decimal)')

test-case.name: subtyping-104
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('record(a,b as xs:decimal)', 'record(a,b as xs:integer)')

test-case.name: subtyping-105
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtype('record(a,b as xs:decimal,*)', 'record(b as xs:decimal, a)')

test-case.name: subtyping-301
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR)', 'element(*, sub:HtR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-302
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR)', 'element(sub:G, sub:HtR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-303
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR)', 'element(sub:F|sub:G, sub:HtR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-304
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtRR)', 'element(sub:F, sub:HtR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-305
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR)', 'element(sub:F, sub:HtRR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-306
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('document-node(element(sub:F, sub:HtRR))', 'document-node(element(sub:F, sub:HtR))')

test-case.name: subtyping-307
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('document-node(element(sub:F, sub:HtR))', 'document-node(element(sub:F, sub:HtR))')

test-case.name: subtyping-308
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR)', 'element(sub:F, sub:HtR?)')

test-case.name: subtyping-309
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtR?)', 'element(sub:F, sub:HtR)')

test-case.name: subtyping-310
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtRR)', 'element(*:F, sub:HtR?)')

test-case.name: subtyping-311
test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('element(sub:F, sub:HtRR?)', 'element(sub:*, sub:HtR?)')

test-case.test: import module namespace sub="http://www.w3.org/qt4cg/subtyping"; sub:isSubtypeSA('attribute(sub:ATT, xs:ID)', 'schema-attribute(sub:ATT)')
